name: Warp
headline: Payroll and Compliance for Startups
description:
Warp is a modern payroll, compliance, and benefits platform built for founders. We put all state tax registrations and compliance on autopilot so you never need to login to another .gov website again.

The last time you think about payroll and compliance will be the time you onboard to Warp.

founders.name: Ayush Sharma, Founder
founders.description: I'm the Founder and CEO of Warp. Previously, I worked at an early-stage startup in New York funded by Thrive Capital and Founders Fund. Before that, I studied Computer Science, earning a bachelor's and a master's degree at MIT.

generated_description:
**Warp: Simplifying Payroll and Compliance for Startups**

Founded in 2023 and hailing from Y Combinator's Batch W23, Warp has quickly established itself as a go-to payroll and compliance platform designed specifically for startups. Based in New York, the company is small but mighty, with a team of just six employees, all dedicated to easing the heavy lifting associated with payroll and compliance.

**The Mission**
Warp’s mission is simple yet profound: to take all state tax registrations and compliance tasks off your plate. As a startup founder, you have enough on your mind without the hassle of navigating through government websites. With Warp in your corner, the last time you’ll think about payroll compliance is when you onboard their service.

**What They Offer**
The platform takes a modern approach to payroll by allowing you to automate your back-office operations efficiently—often in under 15 minutes. Imagine never needing to log into a .gov site again! Their services promise to save startups significant time and money, resolving tax notices instantly and eliminating the dreaded compliance headaches.

A key feature of Warp is its multi-faceted offerings:
- **US Payroll**: Comprehensive payroll management for employees and contractors across all 50 states.
- **State Tax Compliance**: Automated tax deductions and filings all in one platform, reducing the administrative burden.
- **Health & 401(k) Benefits**: Access to group health coverage and easy integration with payroll for benefit deductions.
- **Global Contractors**: Pay international contractors in their own currency or in US dollars—making it seamless to expand your team globally.

**Real Results**
Warp isn't just about promises; they boast impressive metrics:
- Significant savings in annual penalties for customers—over $1 million collectively.
- Founders save around six hours a month thanks to automated compliance processes.
- Fast onboarding, with new companies often set up in just ten minutes.

**Customer Testimonials**
The feedback from users has been overwhelmingly positive. Founders appreciate the user-friendly interface and the rapid support from a dedicated, US-based team. It’s not just about functionality; it’s about building a product that resonates with the needs of busy startup founders.

**Conclusion**
In a world where time and resources are limited, Warp positions itself as a vital partner for startups navigating the complex landscape of payroll and compliance. If you're ready to reclaim your time and eliminate the stress of payroll logistics, Warp might just be the solution you’ve been looking for.

For more information, visit [joinwarp.com](https://www.joinwarp.com/).
